Name: Night Flight
About the game: Pixel RPG Roguelike Shooter based on ATARI games. the Game Includes Enemies with different attack patterns. Mini-boss encounters Level up system. Choose your own build. Tank? Glass Cannon? Utility? Your choice! Secret medals. These are like achievements. They are secret.. For each one you find, you get a permanent upgrade on your ship. Leaderboard with the developer's and testers high scores. Can you beat us ? Beautiful and catchy 8-bit music. If you like the game, share it.. and I will keep updating it! More enemies, bosses and more... :) Shao Indie
